text:
COPY
PRANK E. SCHOOLEY
JACK DUNN HAS MATURITY, BACKGROUND AND IMAGINATION NEEDED FOR
EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. THERE IS POSSIBILITY HE WOULD BE AVAILABLE.
SUGGEST HIS NAME BE INCLUDED IN PREFERENTIAL LISTING.
ALLEN MILLER
KW6C
PULLMAN, WASHINGTON
REPLY (Dictated by Schramm and signed by fmh)
FRANK SCHOOLEY ON VACATION IN VIRGINIA AND UNAVAILABLE BY
TELEGRAPH. SUGGEST YOU WIRE SIGGEL. SCHOOLEY HAS NOTHING TO
DO WITH MAKING UP LIST.
